text: Filiz Aker (20 August 1963 - 27 August 2017) was a Turkish movie actress. Aker died on 27 August 2017, aged 54. Three day later, she was buried at Tuzla Cemetery in Istanbul. ==Movies== * 1986 – Kral Affetmez * 1987 – İnsan Avcıları * 1988 – Kurtlar Geceyi Sever * 1988 – Sürgün * 1988 – Alman Avrat 40 Bin Mark * 1989 – Vahşi ve Güzel * 1994 – Bir Sonbahar Hikayesi ==References== Category:1963 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Turkish movie actors Category:Actors from Istanbul
title: Filiz Aker
